casebody.data:
Keagan FARRIS, BY AND THROUGH his Next Friend, James FARRIS, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
John H. MCKAIG, II, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158015
COA: 337366 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to substitute "ELIZABETH ELLEN MCKAIG, Personal Representative of the Estate of JOHN H. MCKAIG, II" as the defendant-appellee in all further proceedings before this Court is GRANTED.
